abstract: After discovering that its testing equipment was past an inspection deadline, United Airlines said it was retesting altimeters on seven of its Boeing 747s.
snippet: After discovering that its testing equipment was past an inspection deadline, United Airlines said it was retesting altimeters on seven of its Boeing 747s.
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO  United Airlines said Thursday it was retesting an altitude indicating system on seven of its Boeing 747s after discovering that the equipment originally used to test the jets was itself past an inspection deadline.

headline.main: United Brings Some 747s in for More Testing
